feedback:
Good attempt at Pataka! You're on the right track. Here's what to focus on:

**What to adjust:**
• The fingers need to be held more closely together. Imagine they are all touching from base to tip!
• Bend the thumb slightly and press it gently against the side of your palm.

**You're doing well:**
• Your fingers are straight, which is a great start.

Keep practicing - you're making progress!
